text:
Reunite with your loved ones at Big4 Holiday Parks Published on : Saturday, July 4, 2015
Whether you’re after a spontaneous family reunion, a short road trip, or a surprise getaway to reunite the family for a mid-winter break, BIG4 Holiday Parks is the perfect host.
With an impressive range of fun activities and facilities, combined with first-rate accommodation, the 180 BIG4 Holiday Parks are the perfect base for family and friends to mingle.
As well as traditional caravanning and camping facilities, BIG4 boasts luxurious cabins and spacious villas, which provide all the comforts of home and are perfect for large groups to holiday together. To mark the cooler season, BIG4 is running a ‘Book online and stay in July’ deal, offering families the chance to win back the cost of their booking.
BIG4 Holiday Parks CEO, Steven Wright, says the winter months pose a perfect opportunity for groups to spend valuable time together without the festive season chaos and peak travel costs.
“Rather than waiting until the often hectic December/January period, family groups and friends should take advantage of BIG4′s range of cosy, luxury cabins in idyllic settings across the country to embrace or escape winter,” Steven says.
“With everything from giant jumping pillows and indoor heated pools for the kids to enjoy, and city-style cabins with iPod docks, barbecues, and private balconies for entertaining, it’s a great getaway option.”
BIG4 provides guests with outstanding versatility, such as venturing north to escape the chill at the stunning coastal setting of BIG4 Caloundra Waterfront Holiday Park, ‘rugging up’ and embracing a bush walk at BIG4 Port Elliot Holiday Park, or settling in to BIG4 Yarra Valley Holiday Park for a cosy getaway.
